title: 怎么搞一个刷怪笼
author: SilentSkyShine
txt_content:
怎么搞一个刷怪笼
1.雪傀儡
2.铁套装（要有附魔保护1）僵尸
3.击退1弓铁套（也要附魔保护1）的小白
4.雪球刷怪笼

replies.author: 猜猜谁是谁
replies.txt_content:
猜猜谁是谁 发表于 2017-11-21 19:41
还有 这个1.12亲测可用  如果你用的比较老的版本再跟我说
你又不早说。。。下次记得一定注明版本号 不然鬼知道你要的哪个版本的指令
1./give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{id:"MobSpawner",EntityId:SnowMan,SpawnData:{Riding:{},},SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,SpawnPotentials:[]}}复制代码
2./give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{id:"MobSpawner",EntityId:Zombie,SpawnData:{Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:air",Count:1b,Damage:0s},{id:"minecraft:iron_boots",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_leggings",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_helmet",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}}],CustomName:"",CustomNameVisible:1},SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,SpawnPotentials:[]}}复制代码
3./give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{id:"MobSpawner",EntityId:Skeleton,SpawnData:{Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:bow",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:49s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_boots",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_leggings",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_helmet",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}}],CustomName:"",CustomNameVisible:1},SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,SpawnPotentials:[]}}复制代码
4./give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{id:"MobSpawner",EntityId:Snowball,SpawnData:{Riding:{},},SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,SpawnPotentials:[]}}复制代码
很累的好吧。。。
还有 如果你安装的是mch最新版 你可以按右上角的自定义 然后拉出的菜单栏下方可以选择版本

replies.author: 猜猜谁是谁
replies.txt_content:
1./give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{id:"MobSpawner",SpawnData:{id:"minecraft:snowman",},SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,SpawnPotentials:[]}}复制代码
2.（刷怪蛋）/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 1 0 {EntityTag:{id:"minecraft:zombie",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:iron_boots",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_leggings",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_helmet",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}}]}}复制代码
3.（刷怪蛋）/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 1 0 {EntityTag:{id:"minecraft:skeleton",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:iron_boots",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_leggings",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}},{id:"minecraft:iron_helmet",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:1s}]}}],HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:bow",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:49s,lvl:1s}]}}]}}复制代码
4./give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{id:"MobSpawner",SpawnData:{id:"minecraft:snowball",},SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,SpawnPotentials:[]}}复制代码
还有啊 善用软件啊 你当论坛的软件版是摆设啊
地主家的傻孩子
